Let’s get an update on Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain’s future…

There’s a real tug-of-war of developing between Chelsea and Liverpool for the England international’s services.

Chelsea agreed a fee with Arsenal for the midfielder but we are told a move to Stamford Bridge is a no at the moment. Now the player wants to go to Liverpool and the Reds are now in talks to sign him.

The big question is will they match Chelsea's bid? We've been told we are not going to get a running commentary on the talks but it looks like it's only a matter of time before Liverpool a bid.

What about Chelsea? Well they're working on lots of other deals but they haven't totally given up on signing Oxlade-Chamberlain.
